Posted By: Tom Botticelli
I am accepting offers on a nice mid-grade N162 Baseball set before I send it to one of the auction houses.  If anyone is interested please contact me at tbotticell@aol.com for scans and offers.  Here is a list of the players and conditions.  Shipping and Insurance is to be determined depending on the offer.

Andrews PSA 5 Very High End
Anson SGC 50 High end 
Brouthers PSA 4
Caruthers SGC 50
Dunlap SGC 50
Glasscock PSA 4
Keefe SGC 50
Kelly SGC 30 High End

Thanks,

Tom
